body:
Comment 5: 
Just a non-productive comment :-). I tried to run your test program:

C:\issue3662>go run test.go
# command-line-arguments
test.go:3:17: fatal error: SDL.h: No such file or directory compilation terminated.

I didn't follow your instruction about installing MinGW
http://www.gaia-gis.it/spatialite-3.0.0-BETA/mingw64_how_to.html. But you can't expect
people to complete 20 step process, just to try your program. Be serious. This whole Go
things is about making things simpler.

Alex
